review.title: “Every hour I worked, I knew I was contributing to the good of the company.”
review.pros: Pros – Small work environment.Clear lines of communication with management.Autonomous workplace.Freedom to explore career paths.Very friendly environment.Strong camaraderie among employees.
review.cons: Cons – Direction of company is difficult to tell.Difficult financial constraints.Wide range of products are difficult to keep track of.Work bottle necks occur often.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Overall, I had a very good experience working for Q-Track. Management put a lot of time into developing my education and they were extremely helpful/respectful of my career aspirations.
